title: Advanced MERN Todo Manager
description: A smart Todo app with categories, reminders, dark mode, and full CRUD with backend sync.
challenge: Users needed a more advanced Todo system with multiple lists, reminders, and auto-sync between devices. Maintaining clean state while syncing with a live backend was tricky.
solution: Built a modular React UI with category-based todos and optimistic UI updates. Backend built using Express + MongoDB stored all tasks with timestamps and reminder flags. Implemented throttling to prevent duplicate writes and added JWT-based login so users can sync todos across devices.

title: E-Shop Admin Panel
description: A production-grade e-commerce admin dashboard with full CRUD operations, analytics, and secure authentication.
challenge: Needed a protected dashboard with multi-role access, image uploads, product filtering, and secure API endpoints. Handling large product datasets created bottlenecks.
solution: Implemented a robust Express API with access + refresh tokens. Added Cloudinary image uploads and built pagination + indexing for fast MongoDB queries. The React admin UI includes tables, analytics charts, protected routes, and form validations.

title: TaskFlow Kanban Board
description: A Trello-like drag-and-drop Kanban workflow app with board sharing and real-time updates.
challenge: Drag-and-drop actions needed to be synced instantly with the backend without breaking column or card order. Multiple users editing the same board created conflicts.
solution: Used React Beautiful DnD with optimistic UI updates and atomic MongoDB operations to maintain ordering. Added JWT authentication + board-level permissions. Designed a clean REST API for stable real-time syncing.

title: DineEase Restaurant Website
description: A modern restaurant website with online reservations, menu management, and an interactive admin dashboard.
challenge: The restaurant wanted real-time table booking with blackout times and admin control. Managing menu items and reservation slots dynamically was complex.
solution: Built a fully dynamic reservation system with availability logic and server-side conflict checks. Admins can add/update menu items, track bookings, and manage special offers. Used Framer Motion for premium UI transitions.

title: SolarVision: Interactive Solar System
description: A 3D interactive solar system model connected to a real-time NASA API for live planet data.
challenge: Rendering accurate 3D models in browser while fetching real NASA data caused performance and API rate-limit issues.
solution: Used Three.js for lightweight 3D rendering and built a Node proxy API to cache NASA data hourly, reducing rate limits. Added orbit animations and real-time stats for planets using React state.

title: BookNest Library CMS
description: A digital library system with book management, user roles, reviews, and borrow/return tracking.
challenge: Needed a complete CMS where admins manage books and users can borrow or review them. Creating secure role separation (admin vs. reader) was difficult.
solution: Built role-based authentication, protected admin sections, and borrow-history tracking. Created a clean React UI with categories, search filters, and review forms. Backend ensures a book cannot be borrowed twice simultaneously.

title: QuickVerse Multi-API Dashboard
description: A dashboard combining Google Books, Quotes, and Dictionary APIs with resilient error handling.
challenge: Multiple third-party APIs had inconsistent data formats and frequent failures, causing UI breaks.
solution: Used Promise.allSettled to stabilize API calls, normalized all responses, and built a Node proxy server to handle CORS and caching. The UI loads even if one API fails.

title: MERN BlogSphere
description: A modern blogging platform with markdown editor, user authentication, comments, and tags.
challenge: Needed a secure CMS where writers can publish, update, and manage blogs. Handling markdown, media uploads, and comment spam was challenging.
solution: Added a markdown editor, JWT authentication, protected author areas, server-side validation, and a spam filter. Used MongoDB text indexing for fast blog search and category filtering.
